item.title: RT by @bainofyrexstnce: A friend who volunteers at an abortion clinic in Florida says one thing they can really use right now is donations of prepaid gas cards to help people traveling out of state. A thing to consider if you have the means ❤️

item.description: A friend who volunteers at an abortion clinic in Florida says one thing they can really use right now is donations of prepaid gas cards to help people traveling out of state. A thing to consider if you have the means ❤️

item.title: RT by @bainofyrexstnce: You are allowed all your grief and despair but I promise you there are systems in place to help: with funding, with travel, with obtaining pills. People have been building this for years. It works. And every one of us can do something to make those systems more robust.
item.dc:creator: @CharoShane
item.description: You are allowed all your grief and despair but I promise you there are systems in place to help: with funding, with travel, with obtaining pills. People have been building this for years. It works. And every one of us can do something to make those systems more robust.

item.title:
women will die because of this, the potential of so many women’s lives will be cut short because of unwanted pregnancies, and yet those ghouls will let children get shot to death in their classrooms and call it the protection of freedom
damn the fucking man

item.title: RT by @bainofyrexstnce: Today, the Supreme Court not only reversed nearly 50 years of precedent, it relegated the most intensely personal decision someone can make to the whims of politicians and ideologues—attacking the essential freedoms of millions of Americans.
item.dc:creator: @BarackObama
item.description: Today, the Supreme Court not only reversed nearly 50 years of precedent, it relegated the most intensely personal decision someone can make to the whims of politicians and ideologues—attacking the essential freedoms of millions of Americans.
